definition: closely and firmly united or packed together, a small cosmetics case with a mirror, to squeeze or press together
details:
adjective
- closely and firmly united or packed together
= example: closely and firmly united or packed together
- briefly giving the gist of something
= synonyms: compendious, succinct, summary
- having a short and solid form or stature
= example: having a short and solid form or stature
= synonyms: thick
noun
- a small cosmetics case with a mirror
= synonyms: powder compact
- a small and economical car
= synonyms: compact car
- a signed written agreement between two or more parties (nations) to perform some action
= synonyms: covenant
verb
- to squeeze or press together
= synonyms: press
- to make more compact by or as if by pressing
= synonyms: compress, pack together
- to compress into a wad
= synonyms: bundle, pack, wad
- to have the property of being packable or of compacting easily
= example: to have the property of being packable or of compacting easily
= synonyms: pack
